sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都表示物品价格"高的，昂贵的"之意。
means: dear ： 侧重指要价过高，或远高于公道、合理的价格，其反义词是cheap。
expensive ： 指物品的价格超过了它本身所值，或超过了购买者的支付能力。
costly ： 指物品价格高，通常是因物品稀少或珍贵所致。

sentence.Network_en: Psychometric tests can save organizations from grim and costly mistakes.
sentence.Network_cn: 心理测试能够使组织机构避免犯下损失惨重的大错。

sentence.Network_en: The proposed regulations are ill-defined and cumbersome and could be unnecessarily costly.
sentence.Network_cn: 提议的规章制度阐述不清、复杂低效，而且可能会带来不必要的过高花费。

sentence.Network_en: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is costly.
sentence.Network_cn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... godly 神的，神圣的 costly 昂贵的 lovely 可爱的，好看的.

iBT托福阅读1200词汇 - 豆丁网 ... cosmic \adj. 宇宙的 costly \adj. 昂贵的, 贵重的 counteraccusation \n. 反控.

list.abs: Young drivers face costly car insurance ., 年轻的司机们要面对昂贵的车险.
... 3.  Yes,I know. It's very costly. 是的，我知道。要花很大一笔钱。 too costly: 成本太高了 Costly Spices: 昂贵的香料.
Switch arrows and signals of semaphores and transport costly presents from one station to another ., 改变动臂信号机箭头方向和信号并运输贵重的礼物从一个站到另一个站.
costly的意思中文翻译 ... chamber grit 硬渣室 costly jewelry. 昂贵的珠宝 a costly war. 损失惨重的战争.

entry.def: If you say that something is costly, you mean that it costs a lot of money, often more than you would want to pay.

example.ex: Having professionally made curtains can be costly, so why not make your own?
example.tran: 既然找专门人员做窗帘非常贵，为什么不自己做呢?

entry.tran: 造成严重损失的;代价大的
entry.def: If you describe someone's action or mistake as costly, you mean that it results in a serious disadvantage for them, for example the loss of a large amount of money or the loss of their reputation.

example.ex: Psychometric tests can save organizations from grim and costly mistakes...
example.tran: 心理测试能够使组织机构避免犯下损失惨重的大错。

example.ex: This sort of scandal in international banking has been politically costly.
example.tran: 国际银行业的这种丑闻一直以来都会造成极其恶劣的政治影响。

auth_sentence.content: Shifting to renewable energy will be costly and disruptive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shifting to renewable energy will be costly and disruptive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shifting to renewable energy will be costly and disruptive.

auth_sentence.content: However, this process can be costly and slow.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, this process can be costly and slow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, this process can be costly and slow.

auth_sentence.content: Some will also have multiple and costly chronic conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some will also have multiple and costly chronic conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some will also have multiple and costly chronic conditions.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加

like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: They find it costly to give up their existing assets.
That lets us avoid building costly plants or buying expensive power at peak usage time
Surveys show that the number of worried Americans has been steadily growing over the years as the computer becomes increasingly efficient, easier to operate, and less costly to purchase and maintain.

jushi.english: This is the costliest war in our history.
jushi.chinese: 这是我们历史上付出代价最大的战争。
我们需要某些价值昂贵的材料。
